title: Amazon Employee Access Challenge using Tree Algms
description: Problem definition:The data consists of real historical data collected from 2010 & 2011.  Employees are manually allowed or denied access to resources over time. You must create an algorithm capable of learning from this historical data to predict approval/denial for an unseen set of employees.
description_lemmatized: problem definitionthe data consists real historical data collected 2010 2011 employee manually allowed denied access resource time must create algorithm capable learning historical data predict approvaldenial unseen set employee
